alert.note: Alert for Allen; Beauregard; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 26 at 11:19PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON DAVIS... EASTERN BEAUREGARD...NORTHEASTERN CALCASIEU AND ALLEN PARISHES THROUGH 1145 PM CST... At 1119 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dry Creek to near Ragley to Westlake. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to vegetation and outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Sulphur, Westlake, Iowa, Kinder, Oberlin, Elizabeth, Fenton, Reeves, Dry Creek, Moss Bluff, Sugartown, Mittie, Ragley, Grant, Buller, Harmony, Topsy, Lebleu Settlement, and Gillis. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 27 and 28, between mile markers 33 and 35, and between mile markers 37 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Beauregard; Northern Calcasieu; Northern Jefferson Davis
